[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","Intro",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"React has a community of millions of developers. On this page we’ve listed some React-related communities that you can be a part of; see the other pages in this section for additional online and in-person learning materials."}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"code-of-conduct","children":"Code of Conduct "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Before participating in React’s communities, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://github.com/facebook/react/blob/main/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"please read our Code of Conduct."}]," We have adopted the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://www.contributor-covenant.org/","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"Contributor Covenant"}]," and we expect that all community members adhere to the guidelines within."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"stack-overflow","children":"Stack Overflow "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Stack Overflow is a popular forum to ask code-level questions or if you’re stuck with a specific error. Read through the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"existing questions"}]," tagged with ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"reactjs"}]," or ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://stackoverflow.com/questions/ask?tags=reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"ask your own"}],"!"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"popular-discussion-forums","children":"Popular Discussion Forums "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"There are many online forums which are a great place for discussion about best practices and application architecture as well as the future of React. If you have an answerable code-level question, Stack Overflow is usually a better fit."}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Each community consists of many thousands of React users."}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://dev.to/t/react","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":"DEV’s React community"}]}],"

",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"news","children":"News "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For the latest news about React, ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://twitter.com/reactjs","target":"_blank","rel":"nofollow noopener noreferrer","children":["follow ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"@reactjs"}]," on Twitter"]}]," and the ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/blog/","children":"official React blog"}]," on this website."]}]]}]]
